description: Being in a startup world you constantly hear how you should build a product-based company instead of a service-based one to be able to scale infinitely and earn lots of $. With my experience in building Testlio, I'll dig into what is a crowdsourced services business, how you might productize it and what are the challenges of scaling it.
title: REFRESH2016, Marko Kruustük, Productizing and scaling services business
